item.title: メールでのやり取りTwitterは広告主に対し、広告を掲載し続けるには「検証済みのチェックマークを付けるか、Twitter BlueかVerified Organizationsのいずれかに加入する」必要があると伝えている（Paul Sawers/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Paul Sawers / TechCrunch:
Email: Twitter tells advertisers that they must have “a verified checkmark or subscribe to either Twitter Blue or Verified Organizations” to keep running ads  —  As Twitter's legacy blue check mark system finally comes to an end, the social network's new paid-for verification system …

item.title: ツイッターは、NPR、BBC、新華社など報道機関やジャーナリストのアカウントから「政府系」「中国国家系」のラベルを削除した（Jahnavi Nidumolu/Reuters)
item.description:
Jahnavi Nidumolu / Reuters:
Twitter dropped the “Government-funded” and “China state-affiliated” labels from accounts of media organizations and journalists, including NPR, BBC, and Xinhua  —  Twitter dropped the “Government-funded” and “China state-affiliated” labels, which implies government involvement …

item.title: YouTubeがUMGの著作権表示によりHeart On My Sleeveを引き上げた後、AIを訓練するためのデータスクレイピングは公正使用だと主張するグーグルの法的ジレンマに迫る（Nilay Patel/The Verge）。
item.description:
Nilay Patel / The Verge:
After YouTube pulls Heart On My Sleeve due to a UMG copyright notice, a look at the legal dilemma for Google, which claims scraping data to train AI is fair use  —  If young Metro don't trust you, I'm gonna... tie you up in a decade of fair use litigation.  —  The AI Drake track …

item.title: BuzzFeed Newsの遺産には、輝かしいストーリーと卒業生、そして不始末と不可能で絶え間ない指数関数的成長の悲劇という2つの部分がある（Charlie Warzel/The Atlantic）。
item.description:
Charlie Warzel / The Atlantic:
The legacy of BuzzFeed News has two parts: brilliant stories and alumni, and also the tragedy of mismanagement and impossible, ceaseless exponential growth  —  And it will be a lot less human.  —  If you're curious to know what it was like to work at BuzzFeed News in the salad days of the mid-2010s …

item.title: ラクラン・マードックは、2022年にマードック夫妻をトランプの「不起訴共犯者」と呼んだ記事をめぐり、Crikeyの出版社に対する名誉毀損の訴えを取り下げる（Amanda Meade/The Guardian）
item.description:
Amanda Meade / The Guardian:
Lachlan Murdoch drops his defamation lawsuit against the publisher of Crikey over a 2022 article that called the Murdochs Trump's “unindicted co-conspirators”  —  Move comes days after Fox reached a $US787.5m settlement with the voting equipment company Dominion in a separate defamation lawsuit

item.title: 元マーベル幹部のビクトリア・アロンソ、解雇をめぐりディズニーと数百万ドルの和解成立、弁護士は「ディズニーを批判したことで口封じされた」と語る（Deadline）。
item.description:
Deadline:
Former Marvel exec Victoria Alonso reaches a multimillion-dollar settlement with Disney over her firing; her lawyer says she was silenced for criticizing Disney  —  EXCLUSIVE: The Walt Disney Company has settled with former Marvel Studios VFX chief Victoria Alonso after pink-slipping her last month.

item.title: 2020年6月にローンチし、2021年6月に$12MのシリーズAをクローズした音楽ライブストリーミングプラットフォーム「Mandolin」が、閉鎖を発表（Tim Ingham/Music Business Worldwide）
item.description:
Tim Ingham / Music Business Worldwide:
Mandolin, a music livestreaming platform that launched in June 2020 and closed a $12M Series A in June 2021, announces it is shutting down  —  During the pandemic, it was billed as one of the leading platforms in the music livestreaming space.  Last year, it was named the most innovative music company in the world by Fast Company.

item.title: マストドンのようなTwitter代替の動力として脚光を浴びている、2018年に最終決定されたオープンな分散型SNSプロトコル「ActivityPub」に迫る（David Pierce/The Verge）。
item.description:
David Pierce / The Verge:
A look at ActivityPub, the open, decentralized social network protocol finalized in 2018 that is gaining prominence powering Twitter alternatives like Mastodon  —  The tech industry is abuzz about a new standard for social networking that is more open, more user-centric, and potentially more powerful than Twitter and Facebook.

item.title: ラストの撮影監督ハリナ・ハッチンスさん射殺事件で、アレック・ボールドウィンと装具係ハンナ・グティエレス＝リードの過失致死罪が取り下げられることになった（Winston Cho/The Hollywood Reporter）。
item.description:
Winston Cho / The Hollywood Reporter:
Involuntary manslaughter charges against Alec Baldwin and armorer Hannah Gutierrez-Reed will be dropped in the shooting of Rust cinematographer Halyna Hutchins  —  Baldwin faced two counts of involuntary manslaughter.

item.title: BuzzFeed Newsの終了はデジタルメディアの大転換を告げる：ニュースを主にソーシャルメディアで配信されるテキストとして考える古いやり方は過ぎ去った（Ben Smith/Semafor)
item.description:
Ben Smith / Semafor:
The end of BuzzFeed News signals a vast shift in digital media: the old way of thinking about news as text distributed primarily on social media has passed  —  My old boss and partner Jonah Peretti announced today that he's shutting down BuzzFeed News, which we built together starting in 2012.

item.title: バッファローニュースの変化を深く考察：印刷とデザインのアウトソーシング、スタッフの一時解雇、保険の不手際、記者の減少、高給のリー幹部（Angela Fu/Poynter）
item.description:
Angela Fu / Poynter:
A deep look at the changes at The Buffalo News: print and design outsourcing, staff furloughs, insurance snafus, fewer reporters, and higher-paid Lee executives  —  Lee cut budgets, pushed out veterans and outsourced design and print production at a paper that had been spared the worst of the industry's decline.

item.title: 元F1レーサーのミハエル・シューマッハの遺族は、AIチャットボットが生成した偽のインタビュー記事について、ドイツの雑誌「Die Aktuelle」を相手に法的措置を取る予定だ（Nate Saunders/ESPN.com）。
item.description:
Nate Saunders / ESPN.com:
The family of former F1 racer Michael Schumacher plans to take legal action against German magazine Die Aktuelle for a fake interview generated by an AI chatbot  —  Michael Schumacher's family plans to take legal action against a German magazine that ran an AI-generated interview with the Formula One legend.

item.title: BuzzFeed CROのEdgar HernandezとCOOのChristian Baeslerが、広告主の撤退を受けた同社の削減策の一環として退社、BZFDの終値は19.71%ダウン（Gerry Smith/Bloomberg)
item.description:
Gerry Smith / Bloomberg:
BuzzFeed CRO Edgar Hernandez and COO Christian Baesler are leaving as part of the company's cuts, following advertisers pulling back; BZFD closes down 19.71%  —  BuzzFeed Inc. is shutting its news operation and business-news publisher Insider Inc. is cutting about 10% of its staff …

item.title: フォックスニュースの司会者ダン・ボンギーノは、契約延長交渉が不調に終わり、番組「Unfiltered with Dan Bongino」と「Canceled in USA」を終了し、退社すると述べた（Mark Joyella/Forbes)
item.description:
Mark Joyella / Forbes:
Fox News host Dan Bongino says he is leaving after unsuccessful contract extension talks, ending his shows Unfiltered with Dan Bongino and Canceled in the USA  —  Fox News has ended its relationship with Dan Bongino, who hosted the Saturday night show Unfiltered with Dan Bongino.

item.title: メモを見るBuzzFeedはNewsを閉鎖し、スタッフの15%にあたる〜180人を削減、Jonah Peretti：「収益性の高いHuffPostで単一のニュースブランドを持つことになる」（New York Times)
item.description:
New York Times:
Memo: BuzzFeed shuts down News and cuts ~180 jobs, or ~15% of its staff; Jonah Peretti: “we will have a single news brand in HuffPost, which is profitable”  —  BuzzFeed News, which won a Pulitzer Prize but never made money, is “beginning the process of closing,” the company's founder …
